title: Micro(soft) Essentials Basic Edition 2008 - Full .iso
description:
About
Micro Essentials provides computer users software packages containing specially selected software releases, all bundled into one pack for your convenience.

Release (Full .iso image)
Micro(soft) Essentials Basic Edition 2008 Version 1.0

Information
Micro Essentials Basic Edition 2008 is a must-have software release for every windows user, containing all the basic software releases that are usefull when re-installing your new computer. Our easy to use installation menu makes it childplay installing additional software on your system.

This release includes:
AVG Anti-virus Software 8_100a1295
CCleaner Version 2.08.588
.NET Framework Version 3.5
Adobe Flash Player 9.0.124.0
Java Runtime Environment 1.6.0.6
K-Lite Mega Codec Pack 3.90
Lavasoft Adaware 2008
SeaMonkey 1.1.9
Shockwave Player version 11.0.0.0
Spybot Search & Destroy 1.5.2

Feel free to redistribute our software packages, you\\\&#039;re allowed to post download links and information on forums, blogs etc.. Feel free to share with your friends and burn on cd-rom.
